title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.15 - Record of unpaid tickets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.15 - Record of unpaid tickets

State Regulations

An itemized record of all unpaid pari-mutuel tickets
shall be prepared and a complete record thereof, including total, forwarded to
the commission and the State Tax Department within 30 days after the last day
of each race meeting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
